title: Many Mansions: The Edgar Cayce Story on Reincarnation
description: An affirmation of the age-old belief in reincarnation, a profile of the legendary psychic reveals Cayce's remarkable healing abilities and prophecies and examines the legacy of his work in terms of such issues as past life regression, hypnosis, parapsychology, karma, and more. Reissue.
author: Gina Cerminara
